There is a growing trend in the use of AI in the field of human resources, as companies are starting to realize the potential benefits of using this technology to improve their management of people. AI solutions in HR can help companies to automate routine tasks, such as scheduling interviews or processing employee data, which can free up time for HR professionals to focus on more strategic and important work.

One of the key areas where AI is being used in HR is in the area of people analytics, which involves using data and analytics to understand and improve employee engagement and culture. Aster is an example of an AI-powered app that is specifically designed to help companies do this, by providing real-time insights into team sentiment and offering actionable recommendations for improving engagement and culture.

Another novel aspect of Aster is its use of machine learning algorithms to analyze data from a variety of sources, including surveys, social media, and other forms of feedback. This allows the app to provide a comprehensive view of team sentiment, and to offer more personalized and relevant recommendations to companies based on their specific needs and concerns.

Overall, the use of AI in HR is still a relatively new and emerging field, but it has the potential to revolutionize the way that companies manage their people, by providing more efficient and effective solutions for managing engagement and culture.
